original_text: He made chains like a necklace and put them on the tops of the pillars, and he made a hundred pomegranates and put them on the chains.
korean_text: 성소 같이 사슬을 만들어 그 기둥 머리에 두르고 석류 백 개를 만들어 사슬에 달았으며

sentences.original_text: He made chains like a necklace
and put them on the tops of the pillars
and he made a hundred pomegranates
and put them on the chains.
